News.Title: Zenith Drugs Clarifies NSQ Medicines News Report
News.Summary: Zenith Drugs issues clarification stating no government communication received regarding NSQ medicines, addressing recent news reports on the matter.

News.Title: Zenith Drugs Wins ₹95 Million Odisha Tender
News.Summary: Zenith Drugs Limited successfully secured a significant ₹95 million tender from Odisha State Medical Corporation, marking a major business development for the pharmaceutical company.

News.Title: Zenith Drugs Secures Two Tenders Worth 83.3 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Zenith Drugs has been awarded two tenders with a combined value of 83.3 million rupees. The first tender is worth 68.3 million rupees, while the second is valued at 15 million rupees. The company's current market capitalization stands at 943 million rupees.
